Reviews.Content: wife stayed 3 nights trade clean nice flat screen tv refrigerator microwave hair coffee pot safe housekeeping job day free breakfast set little restaurant door waffles soft boiled eggs beverages average continental breakfast fancy shiny dont expect 3 star hotel prices comfortableclean reasonable sam sham staff nice plan coming
